subtitleNullable: Most Popular Animes of all Time on IMDB
descriptionNullable:
This Dataset displays only the top 1000 Anime of all time on IMDB. It is in the same order as displayed on the IMDB website which is filtered by - "Most Popular Movies and TV Shows tagged with keyword "anime". [**Source**](https://www.imdb.com/search/keyword/?keywords=anime&mode=detail&page=1&ref_=kw_nxt&sort=moviemeter,asc) **DATA DICTIONARY:**
`Title`: The name of the Anime. `Release Year`: The year the anime was released and till which year it is Ended, The OA in the values tells that the anime is still airing. `Genre`: Categories where the anime belongs. `Duration`: Anime running time in minutes. `Rating`: Ratings given by IMDb registered users (on a scale of 1 to 10) `Description`: Summary of the Anime which gives a brief description what it is about. `No. of Votes`: Number of votes cast by IMDb registered users. *Note: There are NA values present in most of the columns, because the value is not available on the source*
